definition: chicken bouillon powder (PRC)/essence of chicken, concentrated chicken stock sold as a tonic (Tw)
essence/extract/vitality/energy/semen/sperm/mythical goblin spirit/highly perfected/elite/the pick of sth/proficient (refined ability)/extremely (fine)/selected rice (archaic)

sentences.english: Chicken bouillon is a popular compound condiment in the present market.
sentences.chinese: 鸡精是目前市场上倍受欢迎的一种复合调味料。

sentences.english: See tomato rotten can put some chicken out of the pan.
sentences.chinese: 看番茄烂了就可以放些鸡精出锅。

sentences.english: Season with chicken powder and salt and sprinkle with chilli oil. Stir-fry all together until pieces are well-coated with sauce.
sentences.chinese: 用鸡精和食盐调味，淋入辣椒油翻炒均匀后盛盘。

sentences.english: Add lentils, chicken bouillon and water to the skillet.
This soup tastes much more delicious with a kind of chicken powder seasoning.
sentences.chinese: 这道汤里放了鸡精，味道鲜美多了。

sentences.english: Then stir in rice wine, soya sauce, water, chicken powder and sugar. Bring to boil.
sentences.chinese: 入加饭酒，生抽，水，鸡精以及白糖烧开。

sentences.english: Season with salt, soya sauce and chicken powder.
sentences.chinese: 用生抽，盐和鸡精调味拌匀。

sentences.english: But the salinity that gallinaceous essence place contains is taller, hypertensive patient should take care to absorb.
sentences.chinese: 但是鸡精所含的盐分较高，高血压患者要小心摄取。

sentences.english: Imports of chicken essence and no wonder it must have the approval of documents.
sentences.chinese: 进口的鸡精与咸蛋则必须要有批准公文。
